pages.text: Archetypes are $(l)Player Specializations$() that can be selected from $(l)level 50$() onward. Every player starts out as a $(l)Minecrafter$() that has no buffs and debuffs. $(br2)Each specialization is paid with $(l)Archetype Points$() that can be aqcuired with the craftable $(l)Archetype Stars.$()
Archetypes $(l)can be switched$() at any time, except when in The Vault dimension, as long as you have enough Archetype Points.
